TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(object sender, OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: Um que contém dados de evento.

summary.span: Representa o método que manipulará o evento de de .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando você cria um delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado ao evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a abertura de um fluxo para gravar os dados a serem carregados.The following code example demonstrates opening a stream to write data to be uploaded. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#16)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#16)] O seguinte método é chamado quando o fluxo está disponível.The following method is called when the stream is available.
